short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds youtube-like keyboard controls to Unige's Mediaserver website and to Zoom replay service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Controls:
    "left arrow": seek backward 5s
    "right arrow": seek forward 5s
    "shift + left arrow": seek forward 10s
    "shift + right arrow": seek forward 10s
    "spacebar": play/pause the video

On a touchscreen, double tap on the right/left side of the video player to seek forward/backward 5s.

IMPORTANT: This plugin was only made for and will only work on those URLs:
    *//mediaserver.unige.ch/play/
    "://.zoom.us/*"
